arr.name: Alec
messages: I love this album so much

it feels like every song actually has a meaning to it, Next up forever: about not wanting to grow up because you miss your childhood  Birthday Party: how kids think everything is gonna be ok when our country sucks 100 bad days
about how even the worst days can  about how even the worst
